long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZenFlow, A lightweight ChatGPT client

A lightweight ChatGPT client, leveraging the powerful capabilities of AI, has created features not available on the official website, such as search summaries, video summaries, article summaries, aggregated topic conversations, and prompt words.
long.zh_CN: A tool that helps users summarize search, article, video, and document content.
